sentences.english: Objective serching for better therapy of temporomandibular joint syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨治疗颞颌关节综合征的较好的物理疗法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the application of chest physical therapy (CPT) for COPD of convalescence .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸部物理疗法在COPD患者康复期的应用。

sentences.english: Massage is one of the external treatment of Chinese medicine, is a physical therapy.
sentences.chinese: 按摩是中医的外治法之一，属物理疗法。

sentences.english: The naturopathy that reduces blood pressure?
sentences.chinese: 有没有降低血压的物理疗法呀？

sentences.english: Polio victims need physiotherapy to prevent the atrophy of affected limbs.
sentences.chinese: 小儿麻痹症患者需要物理疗法防止病肢萎缩。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Physiotherapy , The University of Queensland.
sentences.chinese: 这是昆士兰大学物理疗法系的网站。

sentences.english: Training of the function in naturopathy appears more effective.
sentences.chinese: 物理疗法中功能训练显得更为有效。
